subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tenth-ranked Auburn held off No. 22 Nebraska to win the Cotton Bowl, 17-14, giving the Tigers a record of 11-2 and probably securing a top-10 final ranking.
snippet: Tenth-ranked Auburn held off No. 22 Nebraska to win the Cotton Bowl, 17-14, giving the Tigers a record of 11-2 and probably securing a top-10 final ranking.
